_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: JMusicBot
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: A Discord music bot that's easy to set up and run yourself!

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
apk add --no-cache curl jq

GITHUB_PACKAGE="jagrosh/MusicBot"
MATCH=all

[ ! -d "/mnt/server/" ] && mkdir /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server/

if [ -z "${GITHUB_USER}" ] && [ -z "${GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN}" ] ; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    echo -e "user and oauth token set"
    alias curl='curl -u ${GITHUB_USER}:${GITHUB_OAUTH_TOKEN} '
fi

## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/${GITHUB_PACKAGE}/releases")

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH})
    CONFIG_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i config)
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i ${MATCH})
        CONFIG_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i config)
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH})
        CONFIG_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i config)
    fi
fi

echo -e "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
        echo -e "link is valid. setting download link to ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_URL}
    else        
        echo -e "link is invalid closing out"
        exit 2
    fi
fi

echo -e "running curl -Lo JMusicBot.jar ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"
curl -Lo JMusicBot.jar ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}

[ ! -f config.txt ] &&  curl -Lo config.txt ${CONFIG_URL}

echo "Job's Done"

variables.name: Discord Bot Token
variables.description:
The token for the discord bot.

https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/
variables.default_value: You need to get a token

variables.name: Bot Prefix
variables.description:
Thew prefix for the bot.

Default is it @mention the bot.

variables.name: Bot Owner ID
variables.description: This is the user ID of the bot owner.
